detail_desc: Shirt in patterned Oxford cotton with a button-down collar and open chest pocket. Short sleeves and a yoke with a pleat at the back. Regular fit – a classic fit with good room for movement and a gently tapered waist to create a comfortable, tailored silhouette.
Tights in a soft, fine knit with an elasticated waist.
Metal keyring with a carabiner hook and fabric strap with a text print. Length approx. 10.5 cm.
Leggings in soft, printed jersey made from a cotton blend with an elasticated waist.

Base layer set in fast-drying functional fabric with jacquard-patterned sections. Top with long raglan sleeves and ribbing around the neckline and cuffs. Bottoms with ribbing at the waist and hems. The base layer set is designed with the minimal number of seams for a more comfortable fit.
Fully lined bikini bottoms with a high waist and wide elastic straps at the sides.
Briefs in cotton jersey with an elasticated waist and lined gusset.
Platform trainers with lacing at the front, cotton canvas linings and insoles and rubber soles. Platform 3.5 cm.

Shorts in an airy linen and viscose blend with a high waist with pleats and a zip fly with hook-and-eye fasteners. Concealed pockets in the side seams, fake welt back pockets and a detachable tie belt at the waist.
Jacket in cotton piqué with a lined, drawstring hood, zip down the front, side pockets and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Regular fit.
Oversized T-shirt in sturdy cotton jersey with a round neckline, gently dropped shoulders and wide sleeves.
5-pocket slim-fit trousers in washed, stretch cotton twill with an adjustable, elasticated waist, zip fly and button.
LOVE STORIES x H&M. Fisherman’s hat in patterned cotton twill with a text print and a fringed edge around the brim. Width of brim approx. 5 cm.
Short, sleeveless dress in an airy weave with decorative gathers around the neckline, an opening with a button at the back of the neck and an elasticated seam under the bust. Satin lining.
Knee-length jersey crêpe dress with a V-neck, spaghetti shoulder straps, a detachable tie belt at the waist and softly draping A-line skirt. Lined bodice.
Sports bra in fast-drying functional fabric with a racer back in ventilating mesh and a wide elasticated hem. Medium support.
Trainers with a padded top edge and lacing at the front. Mesh linings and insoles and rubber soles.

Straight-cut shirt in an airy cotton weave with a collar and buttons down the front. Gently dropped shoulders and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs. Double-layered yoke with a seam and pleat at the back, and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.

Padded parka with a lined, faux fur-trimmed hood and a zip with a wind flap and press-studs down the front. Handwarmer pockets, flap front pockets and a small zipped pocket on one sleeve. Inner ribbing at the cuffs. Quilted lining.
5-pocket trousers in cotton twill with an adjustable elasticated waist and zip fly with a button (press-stud for sizes 2-8Y). Regular fit.
T-shirt in printed cotton jersey.
Long jumper in a soft, chunky knit containing some wool with a ribbed polo neck, low dropped shoulders and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.

Wide dress in airy, crinkled, softly draping chiffon with a V-shaped opening at the top and long, wide sleeves with a drawstring. Seam at the waist with a wide flounce and a drawstring with wide ties that fasten at one side. Lined.
Fine-knit jumper in a soft viscose blend with long sleeves and a lace trim at the cuffs and hem.
Shorts in a cotton weave with an elasticated drawstring waist and side pockets.

prod_name: BEANIE KNIT WIDE FOLD UP NASA
detail_desc: Double-layered hat in a soft, fine knit with a print motif and a turned-up hem.
Knee-length shorts in a cotton weave with an elasticated drawstring waist and patch front pockets.

Calf-length dress in woven fabric with a deep V-neck, sewn-in wrapover at the top and long sleeves with a slit and covered button at the cuffs. Seam at the waist with pleats, a concealed zip at the back, and slits at the front. Unlined.
Jumper in fine-knit cotton with buttons on one shoulder, long raglan sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Thong briefs in lace and microfibre with a low waist and lined gusset.
Short skirt in woven fabric with a high, frill-trimmed elasticated waist and side pockets. Unlined.
Long-sleeved jersey top in a soft viscose blend with a print motif and rounded hem.
Oversized top in sturdy sweatshirt fabric with a print motif on the front, low dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Brushed inside.
Top in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.

LOVE STORIES x H&M. V-neck swimsuit with tie-top shoulder straps and lightly padded cups with removable inserts that shape the bust. V-neck at the back and a narrow belt that accentuates the waist. Lined.
Cold shoulder dress in sturdy, glittery jersey with a flounce at the top, seam at the waist and gently flared skirt. Unlined.
Baby Exclusive. Romper suit in soft, organic cotton jersey with a button placket and chest pocket. Short sleeves and short legs, both with sewn-in turn-ups, and concealed press-studs at the crotch.
Two pairs of hoop earrings in metal and plastic, the larger pair with a tortoiseshell pattern. Diameter 3 cm and 4.5 cm.

Jumpsuit in woven fabric with a slight sheen. V-neck front and back, narrow shoulder straps and a wrapover front with soft draping at the top. Seam at the waist with pleats and a detachable tie belt, a concealed zip at the back, side pockets, and wide, 3/4-length legs.

Top in soft sweatshirt fabric with contrasting colour panels around the sleeves and a lined drawstring hood with a wrapover front. Long sleeves, a kangaroo pocket, and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
High-waisted shorts in a jacquard weave with a slight sheen. Zip fly with buttons, folded waistband with a drawstring, side pockets and wide legs.
Jacket in washed denim with a collar, buttons down the front and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs. Open chest pocket, patch front pockets and one inner pocket. Unlined.
Sunglasses with plastic frames and UV-protective, tinted lenses.

CONSCIOUS EXCLUSIVE. Fitted, V-neck top in an airy Tencel™ lyocell jacquard weave with a pattern in glittery threads. Small gathered frills around the neckline and armholes and along the shoulder straps. Asymmetric seams and a rounded hem. Recycled polyester lining.
Shirt in soft, checked cotton flannel with a turn-down collar, classic front and open chest pocket. Long sleeves with buttoned, raw-edge cuffs and a rounded, raw-edge hem.
Ankle boots in imitation suede with a decorative bow on one side and a zip with a hook and loop tab on the other. Fabric linings and insoles and TPR (thermoplastic rubber) soles.
Fully lined, patterned bikini bottoms with a high waist.

Dress in a sturdy jacquard weave with a sheen. Concealed zip at the back, contrasting colour trim around the armholes, seam at the waist with a drawstring and flared skirt with pleats and side pockets. Unlined.
Fitted dress in stretch velvet with a small stand-up collar, hook-and-eye fastening at the back of the neck, a seam at the waist and open back.

prod_name: Merry HW Slim Mom Denim TRS
detail_desc: 5-pocket, ankle-length jeans in washed, stretch denim. Slightly looser fit with an extra-high waist, button fly and tapered legs. The cotton content of the jeans is partly recycled.
Cap in cotton twill with appliqués and embroidery. Covered elastication at the back.

Blouse in an airy weave with a stand-up collar and gathers at the top both front and back to create soft draping. Opening at the back with buttons at the back of the neck, long balloon sleeves with close-fitting, buttoned cuffs, and a gently rounded hem.
Checked shirt in a soft cotton and linen blend with a turn-down collar, chest pocket and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs.
Long-sleeved top in light sweatshirt fabric with a flounce at the shoulder and ribbing around the neckline and cuffs.
Fully lined sports bra in fast-drying functional fabric with a racer back and wide, taped reinforcements for extra support. Concealed elastication at the hem. Extra firm support.
Long-sleeved jersey top with reversible sequins on the front and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.

CONSCIOUS EXCLUSIVE. Oversized shirt in an organic cotton weave with a grandad collar with a covered button, concealed buttons down the front and a yoke at the back with a pleat for added width. Raglan sleeves with wide cuffs with a slit, buttons down the sleeves and at the sides, and a rounded hem.
Short, fitted, sleeveless dress in ribbed cotton jersey with a V-neck front and back and shoulder straps with a bow on top.

Waterproof trainers in mesh with imitation leather sections, a padded edge and tongue, adjustable hook and loop tabs at the front, a grosgrain loop at the back, and reflective details. Mesh linings and insoles and chunky soles.

Straight-cut blouse in an airy cotton weave with a small stand-up collar, buttons down the front and short raglan sleeves with buttoned cuffs. Scalloped trim around the neckline and down the button band.
Rib-knit hat in soft cashmere.
Jersey T-shirt.
Tunic in a soft viscose weave with a collar, buttons down the front, long sleeves with two buttons at the cuffs, and a rounded hem with slits in the sides.
5-pocket trousers in stretch corduroy with a regular waist, zip fly and button, and slim, ankle-length legs.
Jumper in fine-knit cotton with gently dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Cardigan in a soft, fine-knit viscose blend with buttons down the front and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Blouse in washed cotton denim with an all-over print. Grandad collar, button placket, a gathered yoke at the back and flutter sleeves.

Shirt in woven fabric with an easy-iron finish. Turn-down collar, classic front and darts and a yoke at the back. Long sleeves, narrow cuffs with adjustable buttoning, and a rounded hem. Slim Fit – a fit with narrow shoulders and a tapered waist for a fitted silhouette.
Lined bandeau bikini top with side support and cups with removable inserts that shape the bust and provide good support. Narrow, tie-top shoulder straps, and straps that tie at the back.
Cardigan in a soft, fluffy knit containing glittery threads with buttons down the front and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Fine-knit socks in a soft cotton blend.
Cotton jersey briefs with narrow elastication at the top and a lined gusset.
Shorts in sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and a back pocket. Soft brushed inside.
Straight-style T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with ribbing around the neckline.
Long-sleeved top in lightweight cotton sweatshirt fabric with gently dropped shoulders with press-studs at one side, and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Ankle-length trousers in cotton twill with a high, elasticated waist, side pockets, flap leg pockets and tapered legs with elastication at the hems.
Long-sleeved top in soft sweatshirt fabric with a print motif. Lined hood with a wrapover front that has decorative eyelets, and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Open jacket in airy, crinkled viscose with low dropped shoulders and wide, 3/4-length sleeves.

CONSCIOUS EXCLUSIVE. Fitted, calf-length dress in a soft, fine, rib knit made from recycled polyester containing some nylon. Round neck, wide shoulder straps with decorative ties at the top, a wide ribbed section down the front and back, and a wide flounce at the hem. Unlined.

Biker jacket in soft imitation leather with quilted details. Collar with a detachable faux fur layer on top, and press-studs on the lapels. Diagonal zip down the front, zipped side pockets and long sleeves with a zip at the cuffs. Lined.
